channel.title: Query and Hash Strings :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Query strings (aka search strings) are the part of the URL that appear after the ? and before the optional #. The hash string is the portion of the url after the #. We’ve mentioned them a bit before, but as we dig into dynamic web servers it makes sense to do a deeper dive, as this is where they really come into play. The Hash String First, let’s briefly visit the hash string.
